learning_objective: Recommend improvements to the design of computing devices, based on an analysis of how users interact with the devices.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex is preparing for a public speaking competition. They will use a specially designed software for presentations that helps presenters deliver interactive speeches while displaying dynamic content. They, however, find some difficulty operating certain segments of the software. Which of the following strategies should Alex suggest to the software developers to improve the user interaction?",
    "Answer1": "Adding an explanation document inside the packaging.",
    "Answer2": "Inserting an intuitive and interactive user guide inside the software itself.",
    "Answer3": "Increasing the price of the software to reflect its high quality.",
    "Answer4": "Changing the color of the software interface randomly to make it more interesting.",
    "CorrectAnswer": "2",
    "Explanation": "Having an intuitive and interactive user guide inside the software can improve user interaction as it enables users to easily understand how to use the software effectively. The other options do not actively contribute to easier usage of the software."
}
